reviews.name: Gail B. - Tulsa, OK
reviews.review: Over the past 17 years, I had the pleasure of experiencing unforgettable trips with Show Me Tours...Daniels's vibrant personality brought a positive energy to the group, and the students and parents absolutely loved it. From visiting famous landmarks to enjoying local cuisine, the trip was a perfect blend of learning and fun.

reviews.name: Jessica C.
reviews.review: Show Me Tours did an incredible job at organizing the trip and helping us tour the site. Daniel was full of knowledge about the history of the mansion, the grounds, and the education center.

reviews.name: Ashlyn M. - Perry, FL
reviews.review: We could not have fit so much into this trip if it weren’t for Daniel Ellis with Show Me Tours planning our entire trip start to finish! He booked our accommodations, purchased all of our tickets, and gave us a step by step itinerary (literally like 10+ pages).

reviews.name: Jamie W. - Tulsa, OK
reviews.review: Daniel loves NYC and wants his clients to love the City too.  He goes above and beyond to make your trip special whether it’s a large group or just two of you!

reviews.name: Diane M. - Greenville, NC.
reviews.review: The size and scope of NYC requires a professional tour guide.   Daniel is the ultimate professional!

reviews.name: Mechelle C. - Sacramento, CA.
reviews.review: Show Me Tours offers exceptional service and an extraordinary experience. I can’t wait to travel to NYC again with Show Me Tours and Daniel Ellis!
